name: Napple Tale: Arsia in Daydream
description: Napple Tale: Arsia in Daydream (ナップルテール アリシア イン デイドリーム), more commonly called simply Napple Tale, is a 2.5D platform game for the Sega Dreamcast, released on October 19, 2000 in Japan. It is notable for cultivating a "feminine sensibility" in its design by employing primarily women for its creative staff.
